Package com.bytedesk.call.conference

Class CallConferenceController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.call.conference.CallConferenceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/freeswitch/api/v1/conferences") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="bytedesk.call.freeswitch.enabled", havingValue="true") public class CallConferenceController extends Object
Call会议室管理REST API控制器
